title: Wanted to be nice
body:
I tried gifting a friend a mystery skin but this pops up: exchange.malformedRequest
What does it mean?

replies.body:
Whelp, that error doesn't give you much to work with now does it xD!

I believe that malformedRequest error happens when something goes wrong with the store. Let's try running a quick repair through the game client, and let me know if that helps!

Well dang. Let's go ahead and get you in touch with our billing experts in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They should be able to get things working properly again for you!
So what do i have to do?

Thank you for Your help! Hope this can be resolved today! It's past my friends B day now and i was also gonna gift a yasuo skin which is on sale:( and the last day is today! Again i appreciate your help ty!
